title: HaloPSA Custom Fields Configuration
description: Defines custom field mappings for HaloPSA DTOs. These definitions are used by the generator to create type-safe property accessors.

Name.description: The name or identifier of the asset

SerialNumber.description: The hardware serial number of the asset

User.description: The name of the user to whom this asset is assigned

Model.description: The model identifier or name of the asset

PurchaseDate.description: The date the asset was purchased
